instruction: Based on the historical relationships between factor returns and macro cycles, allocate an overweight exposure to low size and value while maintaining a neutral stance on momentum and yield for 2021.
output: Based on the analysis of historical relationships between factor returns and macro cycles, we recommend an overweight exposure to low size and value factors for 2021. Our adaptive multi-factor model points towards this bias, as well as an underweight exposure to quality and low volatility and a neutral exposure to momentum and yield. We believe that a recovery in economic indicators will continue to be positive for low size and value exposures in the coming year.
